text: BOOST Nutritional Powder Instant Breakfast Drink Mix Chocolate (880 g) is a delicious, convenient and nutritious drink to help you be at your best in the morning. Adding just one cup of whole milk provides 15 g of protein, 3 g of fibre, and 16 essential vitamins & minerals including an excellent source of calcium (per 280 ml serving). With 22 servings per 880 g canister, it's also perfect for blending with your favourite smoothie or adding to your favourite breakfast recipe.
15g Protein: to help build and maintain strong muscles.
16 Vitamins & Minerals: to add wholesome nutrition to your diet
Excellent Source of Calcium: to help maintain strong bones and teeth.
Source of Fibre: as part of a healthy diet.

Skim Milk Powder, Sugars (Sugar, Corn Maltodextrin, Lactose), Cocoa, Oligofructose, Inulin, Soy Lecithin, Carrageenan, Vitamins (Vitamin A Palmitate, Ascorbic Acid, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Niacinamide), Mineral (Ferric Orthophosphate).

Silvanas, originated from the Philippines. This absolute classic Filipino sweet treat is a frozen sandwich cookies that includes a cashew meringue, rich buttercream and cookie crumb coating.Some of the products used in these recipes are not available for purchase Canada. This easy to make recipe is an amazing afternoon treat or fun, on-the-go snack.
Tired of dipping carrots in hummus? Get some carrots in by adding this amazing smoothie to your breakfast - made with carrot-orange juice, banana, yogurt and of course, BOOST.
BOOST High Protein Banana Chocolate Buckwheat Pancakes
Buckwheat is an ancient grain packed with, vitamins, minerals and antioxidants and fibre. When combined with chocolate and bananas this snack packs a wallop of flavour.
Tropical fruits make these into exotic and refreshing pops, perfect for a hot summer day.
